nodes.text: Zadik Lone was a male Mandalorian who was active around the Great Galactic War and the subsequent Cold War between the Galactic Republic and reconstituted Sith Empire. A member of Clan Lone, Zadik eventually met and fell in love with fellow Mandalorian Akaavi Spar. Spar left her clan to join Lone's so they could be together.. When the Sith Empire moved against Spar's clan, she pleaded with Zadik Lone to rally his clan to come to their defense, but they refused to take action. Disgusted, Spar abandoned Lone and his clan to seek out justice for her people.

When word of Clan Lone's refusal to aid a fellow clan spread, Lone and his clan were disgraced, and eventually came to join the criminal contingent of Tayari Rook, a false Mandalorian and the very one responsible for Clan Spar's downfall. Lone and Rook's people later came under attack by Akaavi Spar on the planet Nal Hutta, after the Zabrak female had learned the truth about her clan's demise. Any who didn't flee the encampment when she began her assault were killed.
Zadik Lone was first introduced into Star Wars canon in the massively multiplayer online game, Star Wars: The Old Republic, created by BioWare and released December 20, 2011.
